      • init

        public void init()
          throws AlreadyInitializedException,
                 IncorrectThreadException
        Initialize the renderer (Must be called from a Window)
        Throws:
        AlreadyInitializedException - If the renderer is already initialized
        IncorrectThreadException - If the method is not called from the window
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • render

        public void render()
            throws NotInitializedException,
                   IncorrectThreadException
        Render the scene to the window (Must be called from a Window)
        Throws:
        NotInitializedException - If the renderer is not initialized
        IncorrectThreadException - If the method is not called from the window
        Since:
        1.0.0
